lead_paragraph: The game’s availability, after millions of downloads elsewhere, was a national event. McDonald’s is being featured as a special game location.

byline.contributor: Alex Williams and Hisako Ueno contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Pokémon Go, With Tie-In, Makes It Home to Japan
headline.main: Pokémon Go, With a Corporate Tie-in, Debuts in Japan

snippet: The game’s availability, after millions of downloads elsewhere, was a national event. McDonald’s is being featured as a special game location....
abstract: Hugely popular mobile game Pokemon Go is released in Japan; introduction of game is greeted as national event, with widespread media coverage and governmental endorsement; release includes corporate tie-in with Japanese affiliate of McDonald's, which will make most of its 2,900 restaurants in country available as special game locations.
